title: [HOLD for payment 2024-08-29] [$250] Track expense - Members count is 2 but there is nobody in the Members list
issue_repo_steps:
Action performed: 1. Go to staging.new.expensify.com
2. Go to self DM
3. Click + > Track expense > Manual
4. Submit a track manual expense
5. Go to transaction thread
6. Click on the header
7. Click Members

Expected result: There should be only 1 member which is the self DM user, or there should not be Members tab because there is no active user in the transaction thread (no user comment)

Actual result: None
html_description:
